headline: KPMG LLP Launches Tax AI Accelerator Program
summary: Duke Energy among first Fortune 150 companies participating in program helping tax teams put generative AI to workNew York, New York--(Newsfile Corp. - February 3, 2026) - KPMG LLP, the U.S. audit, tax, and advisory firm, today announced the Tax AI Accelerator Program, a program designed to help corporate tax departments build practical AI skills and integrate generative AI into daily operations.Tax leaders face a clear challenge: transforming the way tax work is done through AI, while also...
